_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 11:52:46 using v2.1
title: How many people are waiting for diagnostic tests?
analysis_commentary: As we've seen in previous charts, the national targets had a big impact on the size of the waiting list. This can also be seen in terms of the total number of people waiting, which fell to a low of almost 400,000 in March 2008. Since then, the list has been steadily increasing and in July 2014 was over 770,000 and is now matching the highs we saw in 2006.
